code: import axios from'axios';var host=3000||process.env.PORT;var api=axios.create({baseURL:"http://localhost:".concat(host,"/api")});export var pipeBis=function pipeBis(){return api.get("/");};export var pipeAllBis=function pipeAllBis(){return api.get('/businesses');};var apis={pipeBis:pipeBis,pipeAllBis:pipeAllBis};export default apis;
